languages.text: "Обсидиановый суд давно не видел столь... занятного зрелища, как это. Пускай обвинения, брошенные Архонту Иремерисс, серьезны... но я не вижу причин пытаться вникнуть в их суть". {n}Друкари на троне взирает на Маражая с голодной издевкой, явно ожидая его реакции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Немедленно избавьте совет архонтов от этого ничтожества и всего того мусора, что он посмел притащить в сей дворец! Арена сдерет титулы Маражая вместе с кожей, а чужие удары перемелют гордость и кости. И только кровь и страдания помогут смыть тот позор, что глупый Дракон навлек на себя сегодня!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Обсидиановый суд давно не видел столь... занятного зрелища, как это. Пускай обвинения, брошенные Архонту Иремерисс, серьезны... но я не вижу причин пытаться вникнуть в их суть". {n}Друкари на троне взирает на Маражая с голодной издевкой, явно ожидая его реакции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "Immediately rid the council of archons of this pathetic wretch and the refuse he dared to drag into the palace! The arena will strip Marazhai of titles and his skin, and the contenders' blows will break his bones and his pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the foolish Dracon brought upon himself this day!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

traits.locale_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

The arena will strip Marazhai of his titles and his skin, and the contenders' blows will break his bones and his pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the foolish Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “黑曜王庭已经很久没看到……如此有趣的场面了。伊芮梅莉斯执政官面临的指控或许确实很严重……但我认为，恐怕根本没必要继续探究这些指控究竟有何根据。”{n}坐在宝座上的黑暗灵族用饥渴的目光瞪着玛拉斋，显然在等待着他的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “将这条可悲的蛆虫，还有他胆敢拖进议会的垃圾清理出去！竞技场将会剥夺玛拉斋的头衔与性命，而其他的角斗士会敲碎他的骨头与荣誉。今天，这个愚蠢的裁决官为他自己带来了耻辱！只有鲜血与痛苦才能洗刷这样的耻辱！”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「オブシディアの法廷が最後にこのような…見せ物を見たのは随分と前のことです。アーコン・イレメリスに投げられた非難は深刻かもしれませんが…その本質に踏み込む理由は見いだせません」{n}王座に座るデュカーリは、明らかにマラズハイの反応を待って、飢えたようにじろじろと見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「オブシディアの法廷が最後にこのような…見せ物を見たのは随分と前のことです。アーコン・イレメリスに投げられた非難は深刻かもしれませんが…その本質に踏み込む理由は見いだせません」{n}王座に座るデュカーリは、明らかにマラズハイの反応を待って、飢えたようにじろじろと見つめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «Largo tiempo ha pasado desde la última ocasión en la que el tribunal de obsidiana fue testigo de un... espectáculo tan interesante como este. Las acusaciones en contra de la Arconte Yremeryss pueden ser graves... pero no veo ningún motivo para profundizar en ellas». {n}El Drukhari del trono lanza una mirada hambrienta a Marazhai, anticipando su reacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Libra al Consejo de Arcontes esta patética criatura y de la escoria que ha osado arrastrar al palacio! La arena arrebatará a Marazhai sus títulos y su piel, y los golpes de los contendientes quebrarán sus huesos y su orgullo. ¡Solo el sufrimiento y la sangre lavarán la vergüenza de la que se ha colmado hoy el necio dracón!».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Cela faisait bien longtemps que la Cour d'Obsidienne n'avait pas assisté à un spectacle aussi... divertissant. Les accusations proférées contre l'archonte Yremeryss sont certes graves... mais je ne vois aucune raison de creuser la question. » {n}Le Drukhari sur le trône fixe Marazhai d'un regard avide, clairement impatient de voir comment il va réagir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Débarrassez le Conseil des archontes de ce misérable et de la vermine qu'il a osé traîner jusque dans ces murs ! L'arène dépouillera Marazhai de ses titres aussi bien que de sa peau, et les coups de ses adversaires auront raison de ses os et de son orgueil. Seuls le sang et la souffrance pourront laver le déshonneur que le pitoyable dracon s'est attiré en ce jour ! »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Der Obsidianhof hat schon lange kein solch ... unterhaltsames Spektakel mehr erlebt. Die Vorwürfe gegen Archontin Yremeryss mögen schwer wiegen ... doch ich sehe keinen Grund, ihre Substanz zu ergründen zu versuchen." {n}Der Drukhari auf dem Thron blickt Marazhai mit einem hungrigen Blick an, offenbar auf seine Reaktion wartend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Befreit den Rat der Archonten von diesem jämmerlichen Wurm und dem Abfall, den er in den Palast geschleppt hat! Die Arena wird Marazhai seine Titel und seine Haut kosten, und die Schläge der Kandidaten werden seine Knochen und seinen Stolz brechen. Nur Blut und Leid können die Schande wegwischen, die der dumme Dracon heute über sich gebracht hat!"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Obsidiyen Divan, bu kadar eğlenceli bir gösteriye şahit olmayalı uzun zaman olmuştu. Arkon Yremeryss'e yöneltilen suçlamalar ciddi olabilir ama bu iddiaların gerçek olup olmadığını öğrenme teşebbüsünde bulunmak için bir sebep görmüyorum." {n}Tahttaki Drukhari, Marazhai'a aç bir bakış atıyor ve açıkça tepkisini görmeyi bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has been a long time since the Obsidian Court last saw such an... entertaining spectacle as this. The accusations flung at Archon Yremeryss may be serious... but I see no reason to attempt to delve into their substance." {n}The Drukhari on the throne looks at Marazhai with a hungry leer, clearly waiting for his reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Obsidiyen Divan bu kadar eğlenceli bir gösteriye şahit olmayalı uzun zaman olmuştu. Arkon Yremeryss'e yöneltilen suçlamalar ciddi olabilir ama bu iddiaların gerçek olup olmadığını öğrenme teşebbüsünde bulunmak için bir sebep görmüyorum." {n}Tahttaki Drukhari, Marazhai'a aç bir bakış atıyor ve açık bir şekilde nasıl tepki vereceğini bekliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
